version_description:
NEW #1: ECG is now on Apple Watch with typical ECG videos
NEW #2: Long press on each case to preview the rhythm
NEW #3: Hide cases that you already learned
NEW #4: ECG clinical interpretation with videos

Thanks for using the ECG app! We regularly update the app to make it better for you and your learning.
Every update of our ECG app includes improvements for user experience and reliability. As new features become available, we’ll highlight those for you in the app

ECG Pro integrates with the Health app now, which enables a feature to replay your own ECG recordings done on your Apple Watch (Only available in ECG enabled regions)
ECG Pro integrates with the Health app now, which enables a feature to replay your own ECG recordings done on your Apple Watch (Only available in ECG enabled regions)
ECG Pro integrates with the Health app now, which enables a feature to replay your own ECG recordings done on your Apple Watch (Only available in ECG enabled regions)
Refresh your ECG/EKG interpreting skills with over 3500 real world ECG recordings and detailed explanations. Identify accurately and save lives quickly.
Refresh your ECG/EKG interpreting skills with over 3500 real world ECG recordings and detailed explanations. Identify accurately and save lives quickly.
Refresh your ECG/EKG interpreting skills with over 3500 real world ECG recordings and detailed explanations. Identify accurately and save lives quickly.

Empower doctors with high quality ECG cases and detailed explanation of each finding, to help gain crucial medical knowledge and ECG interpreting skills.
The ECG app has proved to be very useful for reference on ECG readings. Everything is interwoven beautifully and it reduces the need to look at many different sources.
